title: Panel
body: So, I build my rat in builder, I run it to test it, I don't show up on my panel what can I do?
author: JCrobotss1234alt

comments.body: remind you im super stupid too
Please make sure the IP & Port you provided is valid and you are currently listening üôè

ty it worked, also why does it disconnect at random times?

satisfaction_conditions: Instructions for ensuring proper connection configuration between the rat and panel
Guidance for troubleshooting basic connectivity issues with the panel
Information presented in simple, accessible terms
